name: Monster Hunger
description:
GMC Jam Theme: Pathetic Creature

Developer: TheWingedBlue

Artist: Unreal Boy

A game about a Pathetic Creature that is too lazy to move, and it's starving. So it uses mind powers to command its followers to feed him with some delicious treats.

Be sure to check out how to play!

PD: Web version has a bug of control buttons not disappearing when finishing a level. Desktop version doesn't have this bug.
